text: Eq. 1 Wi=(S-F-Y)/Dp Eq.2 Dp=t/pd Where: W = Maximum transmitted load (lbs, N) S = Maximum bending tooth stress taken as 1/3 of the tensile strength (psi, N/mm?) F = Face width of gear (in, mm) Dp = Diametral Pitch, (in, mm). Y = Lewis Factor (See Lewis Factor for Gears) (no units) t = number of teeth, # P4 = pitch circle of gear teeth (in, mm)
